summary: Successfully fixed Next.js prerendering errors and uploaded all changes to GitHub. Created proper not-found page, updated Next.js config for deployment compatibility, verified build process, and pushed all recent features including PIN authentication and CSV upload functionality to the GitHub repository.
current_status: All changes successfully committed and pushed to GitHub repository (gtmengine/getnius.git). Deployment issues resolved with proper not-found page and optimized Next.js configuration. The platform is now ready for deployment on any hosting platform without prerendering errors.
